definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫, capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
Hebei province (Hopeh) in north China surrounding Beijing, short name 冀, capital Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1]
Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫[Yu4], capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
Hebei Province (Hopeh) in north China surrounding Beijing, short name 冀[Ji4], capital Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1]
Milky Way/Tianhe district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
land west of the Yellow river/Shaanxi, Qinghai and Gansu provinces
priority/sth advocated first/refers to ancient tradition: Worship the river first, then the sea.
Hai He (a system of five waterways around Tianjin, flowing into Bohai 渤海 at Dagukou 大沽口)

sentences.english: A strong wind blows the beer can into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一阵强大的风把啤酒罐吹到了河里面了。

sentences.english: The river is a mile across .
He swam his horse across the river .
sentences.chinese: 他使自己的马游过那条河。

sentences.english: The race started at one side of a river and all the animals had to swim to the other side.
sentences.chinese: 比赛始于河的一畔，而所有的动物都必须游到对岸。

sentences.english: Drop everything, cross that river, help your brothers.
sentences.chinese: 丢下手上的一切，越过那条河，去帮助我们的兄弟们。

sentences.english: There will be floating hotels in the center of the capital along Moskva river embankments next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年在莫斯科市中心的莫斯科河上将出现浮动酒店。

sentences.english: The river banks were lined with people watching the boat race.
sentences.chinese: 河两岸站满了观看赛船的人群。

sentences.english: You went into far Ku-to-yen, by the river of swirling eddies.
sentences.chinese: 你去了瞿塘滟滪堆，紧挨着那条河，密密麻麻的漩涡。

sentences.english: The river debouches into a wide plain.
sentences.chinese: 这条河进入一片广阔的平原。

sentences.english: I often swam across the river.
And there's a river with like crocodiles in it.
An industrial city ins poland on the vistula .
sentences.chinese: 波兰南部的一个工业城市，位于维斯杜拉河沿岸。

sentences.english: The only river goes right through the centre of London, the Serpentine.
sentences.chinese: 唯一一条穿过伦敦中心的河。

sentences.english: Bald eagles and ospreys roost in the old cottonwoods that line the gravel shores.
sentences.chinese: 秃鹰和鱼鹰在砾石河岸边的棉白杨林中栖息下来。

sentences.english: The river was brought under control.
The male lead SooHo looses his mother as a child and lives with his father.
sentences.chinese: 男主人公才河从小失去了母亲，与父亲一起生活。
